notes.title: Data availability
notes.p:
Proxy data are available at the open data repository of the Geological Survey of Denmark and Greenland (GEUS Dataverse 10.22008/FK2/MQDS1L)
72 . The historical air temperature data from Pituffik is available from the Danish Meteorological Institute (dmi.dk), and Arctic Oscillation index data from NOAA/CPC.
